content: A-GTB Abrasive belt Ultimate abrasive tube belts for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Achieve satin finish, mirror finish or a defined surface roughness with our broad grade selection for rough to fine grinding Also available in coarse grain sizes for rougher grinding Non-woven file belts engineered to reduce marks, smears and last longer Developed for best results with Hilti variable-speed abrasive tools for professional metalwork Applications Rough to fine grinding and polishing of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals Obtaining linear medium and fine satin finishes on stainless steel, aluminum and other metals Polishing for mirror finish on stainless steel, steel and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Length: 29.9 in Width: 1-9/16 in Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel ### ITEMS- 2243154 - Abrasive belt A-GTB 40x760 P60 SPX - Package Size 20 pc - 2243155 - Abrasive belt A-GTB 40x760 P80 SPX - Package Size 20 pc
